title: Medals for Cilacap Regency from NASPO and I2ASPO
desc: Sri Widyastuti, S.Pd, a teacher and mentor at SMA MUH 1 Bantul, stated that they sent two teams to this event. desc: The NASPO and I2ASPO competitions were held in a hybrid format at the Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology (ITS) from December 19-21, 2023. In the NASPO competition, the team from SMA Negeri 1 Maos ...

title: SMAN 1 Maos and SMAN 2 Cilacap Achieve Success
desc: The team from SMA Negeri 2 Cilacap raised the issue of marriage restrictions for people living with HIV/AIDS (PLWHA) in Cilacap Regency. After lengthy discussions, it was decided not to implement the proposal. This decision was based on the understanding that PLWHA are human beings, and HIV transmission to partners and children can be prevented through proper medical treatment ...

title: AAL Cadets Win Gold and Bronze Medals at I2ASPO and NASPO
desc: At the end of 2021, cadets from the Indonesian Naval Academy (AAL) made history by winning gold and bronze medals at the Indonesia International Applied Science Project Olympiad (I2ASPO) and the National Applied Science Project Olympiad (NASPO) ...

title: MTs Negeri 2 Probolinggo Wins Five Medals at National and International Events
desc: MTs Negeri 2 Probolinggo successfully won five medals at both international and national events in 2021. These included the International Invention Competition for Young Moslem Scientists (IICYMS) 2021, the National Applied Science Olympiad (NASPO), and the Indonesia International Applied Science Olympiad. title: Twin Students from Katingan Win International Competition
